original_solution_mapping.L1: The number of shoes the factory made was 12000 dolls x 2 shoes/doll = <<12000*2=24000>>24000 shoes
original_solution_mapping.L2: The factory also made for each doll 12000 dolls x 3 bags/doll = <<12000*3=36000>>36000 bags
original_solution_mapping.L3: The set of cosmetics made for each doll was just one, so there are <<12000=12000>>12000 cosmetics sets
original_solution_mapping.L4: Finally, the number of hats for the dolls was 12000 dolls x 5 hats/doll = <<12000*5=60000>>60000 hats
original_solution_mapping.L6: The dolls took in total 12000 dolls x 45 seconds/doll = <<12000*45=540000>>540000 seconds to be made
original_solution_mapping.L7: All the accessories also took 132000 accessories x 10 seconds/accessory = <<132000*10=1320000>>1320000 seconds
original_solution_mapping.L8: Combing both results, we have that the total time the machinery was working was 1320000 + 540000 = <<1320000+540000=1860000>>1860000 seconds

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3750.
    Returns: the total combined machine operation time in seconds.
    """
    # L1
    num_dolls = 12000 # 12000 dolls
    shoes_per_doll = 2 # 2 shoes
    total_shoes = num_dolls * shoes_per_doll

    # L2
    bags_per_doll = 3 # 3 bags
    total_bags = num_dolls * bags_per_doll

    # L3
    cosmetics_per_doll = 1 # 1 set of cosmetics
    total_cosmetics = num_dolls * cosmetics_per_doll

    # L4
    hats_per_doll = 5 # 5 hats
    total_hats = num_dolls * hats_per_doll

    # L5
    total_accessories_count = total_shoes + total_bags + total_cosmetics + total_hats

    # L6
    time_per_doll = 45 # 45 seconds
    total_doll_time = num_dolls * time_per_doll

    # L7
    time_per_accessory = 10 # 10 seconds
    total_accessory_time = total_accessories_count * time_per_accessory

    # L8
    total_combined_time = total_accessory_time + total_doll_time

    # FA
    answer = total_combined_time
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: The number of shoes the factory made was {num_dolls} dolls x {shoes_per_doll} shoes/doll = <<{num_dolls}*{shoes_per_doll}={total_shoes}>>{total_shoes} shoes
The factory also made for each doll {num_dolls} dolls x {bags_per_doll} bags/doll = <<{num_dolls}*{bags_per_doll}={total_bags}>>{total_bags} bags
The set of cosmetics made for each doll was just one, so there are <<{num_dolls}={total_cosmetics}>>{total_cosmetics} cosmetics sets
Finally, the number of hats for the dolls was {num_dolls} dolls x {hats_per_doll} hats/doll = <<{num_dolls}*{hats_per_doll}={total_hats}>>{total_hats} hats

In total, the number of accessories was {total_shoes} + {total_bags} + {total_cosmetics} + {total_hats} = <<{total_shoes}+{total_bags}+{total_cosmetics}+{total_hats}={total_accessories_count}>>{total_accessories_count} accessories
The dolls took in total {num_dolls} dolls x {time_per_doll} seconds/doll = <<{num_dolls}*{time_per_doll}={total_doll_time}>>{total_doll_time} seconds to be made

All the accessories also took {total_accessories_count} accessories x {time_per_accessory} seconds/accessory = <<{total_accessories_count}*{time_per_accessory}={total_accessory_time}>>{total_accessory_time} seconds

Combing both results, we have that the total time the machinery was working was {total_accessory_time} + {total_doll_time} = <<{total_accessory_time}+{total_doll_time}={total_combined_time}>>{total_combined_time} seconds
